results.question: Which duplicate families should we consolidate first?
results.expected_result: Should provide consolidation priorities with evidence and actions.
results.actual_result: Summary: Local LLM could not initialize on this device, so this is a deterministic advisory response. results.question: What are the top 3 coverage gaps by business risk?
results.expected_result: Should identify likely coverage gaps and prioritized actions.
results.actual_result: Summary: Duplicate pressure is best reduced by merging exact duplicates and parameterizing near-duplicate families. Evidence: Top evidence IDs: TC-EX-0 (S-INV-6), TC-EX-1 (S-PRO-11), TC-EX-2 (S-CHE-5), TC-EX-3 (S-CAT-11), TC-EX-4 (S-REP-10), TC-EX-5 (S-RET-1), TC-EX-6 (S-INV-4), TC-EX-7 (S-ORD-2) Recommended Actions: - Remove exact duplicates first (lowest risk, immediate runtime gain). - Convert near-duplicate groups into parameterized test templates. - Set a threshold policy so new duplicate candidates are flagged early.
results.preview: Summary: Duplicate pressure is best reduced by merging exact duplicates and parameterizing near-duplicate families. Evidence: Top evidence IDs: TC-EX-0 (S-INV-6), TC-EX-1 (S-PRO-11
